Frequently Asked Questions.Question: What is City Touch?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: City Touch is a simple, hassle-free and secure digital banking service available for all City Bank customers.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: Why should I choose City Touch?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: City Touch is easy to register online, free to use, provides instant access to up-to-date account information, ensures safe and easy transactions, fast processing, convenient online banking from home or office, 24-hour access, worldwide accessibility, no special software required, and offers a range of online banking services for better financial management.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: Do I have to pay extra for this service?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: There is no extra charge for this service.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: Is the service available 24-hours?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Yes. This service is available 24-hours a day, 7 days a week.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: Can I access this from overseas?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Yes. As long as you can access the internet with the recommended internet browsers, you will be able to access this service.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: Can I see a summary of my accounts?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Yes. You can see a summary of your account profile at the Personal Homepage once you have logged-in to City Touch.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: Can I view the transactions belonging to all my accounts?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Yes, you can view the transactions belonging to all your accounts under the Account Services Account information section.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: What is the available duration for my transaction history?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: You can view your transactional history up to one year for your accounts and the last two statements for your credit card account. Your A/C statements are segmented as per the period selected. Card statements are monthly.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: Can I download and save my account information and latest transactions?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Yes. You can select your latest transaction or historical transactions for a period up to one year from the current date and click on the download button to save the information for your tracking. It can be saved in PDF.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: Can I get confirmation of my transaction?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Yes, you can get transaction alerts.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: What kind of funds transfer can I do in this service?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Fund transfer can be done between your own City Bank accounts, to other City Bank accounts that are already added as a beneficiary, and accounts of other banks that are already added as a beneficiary.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: Do I need to add my accounts before I can use the funds transfer facility?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: No, you don't need to add your own accounts as beneficiary before fund transfer. But for transferring money to 3rd party City Bank accounts or outside City Bank accounts you have to add those accounts in the 'Add Beneficiary' Module.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: How do I add a 3rd party account as a beneficiary or making a payment?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Go to 'Transfer Within City Bank' or 'Transfer Outside City Bank', Click 'Add Beneficiary', write a beneficiary name, fill up the account number field, choose the product type, provide the mobile no. and email ID of the recipient, click on add.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: When will the funds be available in the receiving account after I do an Immediate Fund Transfer to accounts within City Bank?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Fund transfers to other City Bank accounts will take effect right after the transaction. Once the transaction is done, you will be shown a message confirming the fund transfer.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: What are the card services available online?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Cards Balance enquiry, Card Payment, Card statement, Card Block

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: How do I view my credit card statement?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Go to Card Activity module under the Cards module, select your credit card from the drop down list, and select the period for which you want to view the statement.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: How do I pay my credit card bill online?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Go to Credit Card Payment Module, select the card for which you want to make the payment, select the currency for which you want to pay the bill and the account from which you want to pay.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: When will my credit account be updated after payment?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Your credit card account will be updated instantly.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: Can I block my credit card online?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Yes, you can block your credit card online. Go to the block credit card page, select the card from a dropdown list, provide reason for card block and click on block.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: How secure is this service / how safe is my personal information going through the service / what security measures are being used by this service?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: This service employs the 128-bit Secure Socket Layer (SSL), which is one of the strongest encryption technology most commonly used by large-scale online merchants, banks, and brokerages worldwide.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: What is encryption and how is it used to protect my information?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Encryption is a method of scrambling your information to protect its transmission across the Internet. Encryption transforms data into an unreadable form, and decryption reverses that process.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: What are cookies and how are they used for this service?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: A cookie is information that a website puts on your hard disk that it can remember something about you at a later time. We do not use cookies for this service.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: What precautions should I take for this online service?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Besides maintaining the confidentiality of your digital banking ID and password, you should take precautions like not revealing your ID and password to anyone, changing your password if compromised, logging out after each session, etc.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: What should I do if I suspect there are unauthorized transactions on my account?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: If you suspect unauthorized transactions, report to the phone banking immediately. Provide details such as your name, account number, transaction type, date & time of transaction, among others.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: What precautions should I take when using shared/public PCs for this service?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: We strongly recommend not conducting digital banking transactions on shared/public PCs unless safe. Clear browser cache after each session to remove account information.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: How do I safeguard and protect my password?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Avoid using easily identifiable passwords, change passwords regularly, keep passwords confidential, and do not record or share passwords.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: Who can apply for this service?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: To use this service, you must have at least a transactional or Credit Card account with the City Bank.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: How do I apply for this service?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Go to the City Bank corporate website home page, click on the link 'Download City Touch Form'. A PDF application form will be downloaded. Take a printout, fill out the form and submit it to the nearest branch of City Bank.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: What can I do if my Internet Explorer frequently hangs?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: You can try upgrading your PC's Java Virtual Machine.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: What should I do if I am not able to perform any financial transaction?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Ensure that you are using one of the recommended browsers.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: "This program has performed an illegal operation..."
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: This is commonly known as GPF (General Protection Fault). You have to restart your browser usually. If the problem persists, consult your PC vendor.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: What should I do if I do not get a response after clicking on a hyperlink or icon?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Avoid clicking repeatedly, wait for response, do not click 'refresh' or 'reload' button as it will terminate your online session.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: How Islamic Banking customer will enroll into Citytouch?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Islamic Banking customer can log on to the provided link and register online.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: Will Islamic Banking customer have access to Mobile App?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: For the time being Mobile App is not available for Islamic Banking customer. However, it will be implemented soon.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: What will happen to existing Islamic Banking customers having Finacle account and using Citytouch?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Existing Islamic Banking customer having Finacle account will be able to register in new platform and use Citytouch.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: What are the services and features Islamic Banking customers will enjoy?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Islamic Banking customers will enjoy several functionalities and services such as Sign Up, Account Services, Card Services, Transfer, Beneficiary Management, Payment, and other services.

Frequently Asked Questions.Question: Can Islamic Banking customer use both existing and New Citytouch platform if having Finacle account/credit card based Citytouch on current system?
Frequently Asked Questions.Answer: Yes. But once registered in Citytouch with Islamic Banking, you have to add beneficiaries separately and will be able to use both platforms simultaneously.
